text: Tupou VI (Tongan: ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho; born 12 July 1959) is the king of Tonga. He was chosen as the inheritor of the throne by his elder brother, Tupou V, in 2006. After Tupou V died in 2012, he inherited the throne and was given the name "Tupou VI". |- |- |- |- ==References== Category:Prime Ministers of Tonga Category:Kings and queens Category:Current national leaders Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Tupou VI
